/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, their leaves forming a canopy overhead. Power lines stretch across the sky, following the curve of the street. Buildings flank the sides of the street, their facades bathed in soft light. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
